requirements.text: Create a game interface where colored tiles or buttons appear on screen for the player to tap
acceptanceCriteria: Game displays interactive colored elements that respond to clicks/taps
Multiple colors are used in the game interface

requirements.text: Implement game logic that tracks player taps and validates them against the correct color sequence or pattern
acceptanceCriteria: Game responds to user taps/clicks on colored elements
Game provides feedback on whether taps are correct or incorrect

requirements.text: Display a score counter that updates as the player successfully taps colors
acceptanceCriteria: Score increments when player makes correct taps

requirements.text: Store high scores persistently in the backend
acceptanceCriteria: High scores are saved and persist across sessions
Backend provides methods to store and retrieve high scores

requirements.text: Display a leaderboard showing top scores
acceptanceCriteria: Leaderboard shows multiple top scores in descending order

requirements.text: Apply a vibrant, playful visual design with bold color choices, rounded shapes, and smooth animations that make the game feel energetic and engaging
acceptanceCriteria: Game uses a cohesive color palette with bright, saturated colors
UI elements have consistent styling with rounded corners and playful typography
Interactions include smooth transitions and animations
